thread.title: Stevie Nicks: I was never treated as 'second class citizen'

title: Stevie Nicks: I was never treated as 'second class citizen'
text:
Stevie Nicks: I was never treated as 'second class citizen' 12:20pm EST - 00:48 
Fleetwood Mac's Stevie Nicks says she's been lucky in her career and never allowed herself to be treated as a 'second class citizen'. Rough cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
